meta.Title: TRAVELS WITH A DICTIONARY [New York Times, Sunday, February 22, 1948]
meta.Author: Thomas Meekin

across.question: He began his travels at 17, in 1271.
A country traversed by the Poles.
Mediterranean area ruled by Kublai's Tartar chiefs.
Coarse and broken part of flax.
Compiler of a work famous since 1852.

down.question: What the Andamanese and other islanders were.
